conclusion: Initial conditions: Car's speed is 30 m/s, Truck's speed is 10 m/s, Initial distance is 30 m.
Car's velocity decreases linearly from 30 m/s to 10 m/s, Truck's velocity remains constant at 10 m/s.
Car's speed reaches 10 m/s at t = 2 s.
Car's average speed from t = 0 to t = 2 s is 20 m/s, Distance covered by car is 40 m.
Distance covered by truck is 20 m.
Relative distance covered by car with respect to truck is 20 m.
Remaining distance between car and truck is 10 m.
The two cars will not collide.
